body.name: TOZO S4 AcuFit One Smart Watch 1.78" AMOLED Screen for Men Women, Bluetooth Call Dial Fitness Tracker, Heart Rate and Blood Oxygen, Sleep Monitor, IP68 Waterproof, Workout for iOS Android
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 6 hrs 48 mins
features: 【User-Friendly Design with AMOLED】Featuring an upgraded 1.78'' ultra-clear AMOLED HD Display with 368*448 resolution, which has 25% faster response speed than previous, a wider visual range, lower energy consumption, wider color gamut, and higher contrast, TOZO S4 takes you to experience unprecedented crystal clear visual effects.

【All-in-One Smart Watch】TOZO smart watch is the perfect companion for both men and women, combining a fitness tracker and a stylish accessory all in one. Stay connected with its Bluetooth calling feature, as well as call logs and message notifications.

【Comprehensive Health Monitoring】TOZO S4 adopts an high-precision sensor that accurately measure your heart rate and blood oxygen levels, stress testing in real time. Furthermore, the health watch tracks your sleep patterns to ensure you get the restful night's sleep you deserve, including deep sleep, light sleep, and REM sleep stages.

【Versatile Fitness Tracker】With over 100 different sports modes, our TOZO S4 helps you stay active and reach your fitness goals. Whether you're running, cycling, or practicing yoga, this watch will accurately track your workouts and provide valuable insights to improve your performance.

【Worry-free Battery Life】Equipped with a high-capacity 300 mAh battery that ensures up to 7 days of use on a single charge, ultra-long 30 days standby mode, and takes only about 2 hours to fully charge, The activity tracker fulfills your need for long battery life on business trip or travel. Plus, it is waterproof, making it perfect for daily outdoor activities.

【Bluetooth Connectivity and Compatibility】When the TOZO S4 smart watch is connected to the app via Bluetooth, you can control the music player, check today's local weather, and support mobile search functions. TOZO S4 (AcuFit One) syncs seamlessly with iOS 11.0+, Android 9.0+ smartphones. Go to App Store or Google Play to download and install "TOZO Health" for free, then connect our smart watch to your phone to start your smart life journey.

【Personal Appearance】The high-strength aluminum alloy shell injects solid protection into the watch. The skin-friendly material strap is designed to fit your wrist better and give you a comfortable touch. At the same time, the S4 smart watch also has a convenient magnetic charging function and provides a variety of personalized watch face options, allowing you to show your personal style as you like.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Personal assistant on the wrist with a plethora of features at a bargain price.
reviews.reviewText: I have been using a smartwatch for a few years and tried this Tozo watch. For price, performance and build quality it is superb. Seamless with a cellphone and doing micro-workouts during the day. Here are some of the good points of this watch:Price and ValueThe Tozo S4 smartwatch is very inexpensive compared to other comparable smartwatches in the market. About 1/10 of the cost of some Samsung or Apple smartwatches. It offers a great value for the money, as it has many functions and features that are comparable or even better than some of the more expensive watches.Design and DisplaySleek and elegant design that looks good yet feels sturdy. The screen has a high resolution of 240x240 pixels and a brightness of 450 nits, whatever that means. I just know its clear and visible in any light condition. Great selection of watch faces to choose from.Battery and ChargingLong battery life. I get nearly 7 days on a single charge with decent usage. , depending on how you use it. It also has a fast magnetic charging system that can fully charge the watch in about 2 hours. Always visible low battery reminder and a power saving mode that can extend the battery life even more.Health and FitnessWhere this things really shines is in this area. With all the sport selections and the convenience of immediate starting it is great for micro-workouts during the day. Nor heart rate monitoring strap fiddling. This convenience is worth the watch. It gives you read out of the details of the micro-workout and saves it so you can see how you did for the whole day. I tested the heart rate and blood oxygen levels against my two oximeters and they were perfect. No heart rate device that does not use a strap is going to be precise when moving. The Tozo S4 smartwatch is a great companion for your health and fitness goals. I do not use some of the health functions so cannot comment ( sleep tracker, pedometer, etc.). I like the way the watch can sync with your phone and the Tozo app to see data and trends in detail.Connectivity and NotificationsBluetooth connections and notifications were spot on. While the watch can also control your phone’s music player and camera, and as show notifications from various apps that you can select from the app. I also like that it Google Assistant.Other FeaturesIt has the extra clock functions: a timer, an alarm, a stopwatch, and a world clock for five time zones. Nice. The phone locator is more convenient to make it easy find the connected phone.ConclusionTerrific smartwatch for the bargain whether for using with a cellphone and doing micro-workouts during the day or full workouts Full of features and a solid build.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars "Tozo S4 Smartwatch: Affordable Brilliance for Your Wrist"
reviews.reviewText: The Tozo S4 smartwatch emerges as a tech marvel, seamlessly integrating affordability, performance, and robust build quality. Priced remarkably lower than major competitors, it astounds with a feature-rich repertoire. The high-resolution 240x240 pixels display, boasting 450 nits brightness, ensures clarity in diverse lighting conditions. The watch's design, not only aesthetically pleasing but also sturdy, elevates the overall user experience. With a nearly 7-day battery life and rapid magnetic charging in 2 hours, it strikes an optimal balance between longevity and efficiency.Health and fitness aficionados find a haven in the Tozo S4, offering a plethora of sport selections and hassle-free heart rate monitoring. The watch's accuracy, verified against oximeters, instills confidence in its health tracking capabilities. Connectivity and notifications unfold seamlessly through Bluetooth, enhancing user utility. The integration of Google Assistant and additional clock functions adds sophistication.The Tozo S4 is a technological marvel, delivering a comprehensive smartwatch experience that surpasses expectations, all within an attractive price point.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great smartwatch! Love the Tozo products. We have several of their headphones and the smartwatch has not disappointed. It's a great price and value. I compared functions of other smart watches and the functions on this are very comparable while saving a ton of money. The screen is very responsive to touch and movement. The colors are vibrant. The health functions are working. It tracks steps, oxygen levels, heart rate, and monitors sleep patterns. I like how it has a wide variety of great looking watch faces. You can even add your own picture to be one of the watch faces. Battery life is good and you can change the settings to save battery or use more (ie - brightness levels, etc). It just depends on how you use the watch. The app on the phone is great and connects easily to the watch (see screenshot).The call functions work great. I have received calls through the watch and I am able to talk and hear through the watch. The speaker is decent. I have also spoken into the watch for some google assistant things. Sometimes that is inconsistent. It allows media controls (pause, skip, etc) which is helpful if running or exercising with the watch. The clock functions have a timer and stopwatch. I also like choosing from the app, which app notifications on my phone to display on the app. As far as I can tell for text messages, you can only view the texts and not reply from the phone. But I'm fine with that as I don't want to try to type on the phone anyway. It's just nice to see what notifications are pinging me without having to pull out the phone.A few things Tozo could improve....It would be helpful if the time and stop watch could run in the background. You have to stay on those screens for them to run. The world clock allows you to add up to 5 cities. Again, an improvement for Tozo would be to add more cities in the search for world times. While the multitude of watch faces is nice, I haven't figured out how to change out the 4 preset faces that are stored on the watch that you can rotate through. It only lets me add and change the 5th preset. It would be nice if I could choose all 5.Other than those few things, I am very happy. I have been testing this for a week now pretty heavily. I am very happy.
